title: About Us
intro:
# Hello!

Thank you for taking the time to visit my blog that is powered by **Netlify CMS**! The content of the blog posts and the static pages are transformed into markdown by Netlify. The markdown is then generated into HTML through a Vue library in Nuxt. Nuxt and Vue are able to generate the pages statically so that you'll be able to get a *blazing fast user experience*!
